title: Problem with lobby's
body:
I know other people might have this issue also but would it be possible to have it so a player can't ban a champ that someone has selected on your team? I get tired of having Volibear banned because I play him support and its fun for me. I do fairly well with him in the support role also but It's annoying when I have to dodge 3 lobby's a day because they see me going for voli and when I ask they reply with;
"Oh I was playing pokemon go"
"Sorry, I wasn't looking"
"I don't like troll picks"
I don't know about anyone else but I don't like it when I can't play who I want just because someone is taking a normal game to seriously.

replies.body:
Just don't hover Voli until the ban phase is over...

Or duo with a jungler and have them pretend they're going Voli.
I get this but then what if someone bans just because they don't like him? I don't see the harm in not being able to ban team selected champs.
Update. Now I am getting my Sona banned because people don't like her and don't "trust me" with her yet they have never seen me play?
Sona's just a common ban right now.
Whenever I accidentally ban someones selected pick I just dodge for them because I feel like an ass.
